## ModelRelationalFieldFunctions type

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type ModelRelationalFieldFunctions<T extends ModelRelationalFieldParamShape, RM extends string | symbol, K extends keyof ModelRelationalField<T, RM> = never> = {
```
